text: yadi tum inakaar karoge to allaah tumase nisprh hai. yadyapi vah apane bandon ke lie inakaar ko pasand nahin karata, kintu yadi tum krtagyata dikhaoge, to use vah tumhaare lie pasand karata hai. koee bojh na uthaega. phir tumhaaree vaapasee apane rab hee kee or hai. aur vah tumhe bata dega, jo kuchh tum karate rahe hoge. nishchay hee vah seenon tak kee baaten jaanata hai
